articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Is COVID-19 immunity strongest from prior infection or vaccination? New study has some hints - OregonLive
articles.description: The study was done before the omicron variant took over and before many Americans received booster doses, which have been shown to dramatically amplify protection. The analysis also did not include information on the severity of past infections, or address th…
articles.content:
A new study in two states that compares coronavirus protection from prior infection and vaccination concludes getting the shots is still the safest way to prevent COVID-19.
